dialogue.htmlContent:
Separating the gateway from the fortress's wooden keep, there's nothing but a deserted, squalid courtyard. Discarded bottles, assorted junk, and piles of miscellaneous refuse are scattered haphazardly across the area, giving this place a very run-down and ruinous look.

Over in one corner, there sits the main keep. While of better construction than the perimeter wall, it's nevertheless a very shabby structure. Made primarily out of crudely-formed wooden stakes, and covered with odd pieces of sheet metal and plywood boards, this solitary building is the only point of interest inside the fortress's walls.

While the perimeter wall's hazardous construction prohibits anyone from climbing over it, there's nothing stopping you from utilising your ability to fly in order to get to the other side. Breaking out into a short sprint, you quickly launch yourself into the air, before flying over the defensive barrier and swooping back down to land on the floor of the cavern beyond.

Despite the builders' liberal application of metal sheeting and wooden offcuts, there still exist many small gaps in the keep's walls. From these, slivers of light shine out to cast a pale golden glow on the floor and walls of the fortress's courtyard.

Illumination isn't the only thing that's escaping through the cracks in the walls, for as you approach the poorly-constructed wooden doors before you, cackling laughter and snippets of vulgar conversation can be heard coming from within the keep. Although three of these voices are higher-pitched and clearly belonging to imps, a fourth, [npc.feminine] voice sounds a little deeper, and a lot more ominous.

If you were to enter this keep, the occupants would undoubtedly notice you almost immediately. You should be prepared for the worst, and expect to not only have to fight three imps, but also the leader of the gangs which roam the surrounding tunnels...

Having defeated [impAlphaLeader.name], the [impAlphaLeader.race] who led the imp gangs roaming the surrounding tunnels, [impAlphaLeader.her] keep is now completely deserted. The front doors have been left wide-open, and, taking a cursory glance inside, you see that there's absolutely nothing within that would be of interest to you. There's nothing more to do here except turn around and go back the way you came...

#IF pc.isQuestProgressGreaterThan(QUEST_LINE_MAIN, QUEST_MAIN_2_B_SIRENS_CALL) #THEN [style.italicsMinorBad(You get the feeling that [impAlphaLeader.name] will return to reclaim [impAlphaLeader.her] fortress sooner or later!)] #ELSE [style.italicsBad(You get the feeling that [impAlphaLeader.name] will not be back until you've dealt with the Dark Siren!)] #ENDIF

Despite the builders' liberal application of metal sheeting and wooden offcuts, there still exist many small gaps in the keep's walls. From these, slivers of light shine out to cast a pale golden glow on the floor and walls of the fortress's courtyard.

Illumination isn't the only thing that's escaping through the cracks in the walls, for as you approach the poorly-constructed wooden doors before you, cackling laughter and snippets of vulgar conversation can be heard coming from within the keep. You can hear the distinctive, ominous voice of [impAlphaLeader.name] as [impAlphaLeader.she] joins [impAlphaLeader.her] three alpha-imp guards in conversation.

As [impAlphaLeader.name] no longer considers you a threat, you could enter the keep without risking a fight...

Pushing on the keep's crude wooden doors, you're pleased to discover that they're not locked, and, with a creak loud enough to make you flinch, they swing open before you. Stepping forwards into the building, you discover that the interior of the structure is just one big open hall. Numerous arcane-powered lanterns are fixed to the walls, which cast a light golden glow over the rickety wooden floor and the oddly-assorted tables and chairs that have been pushed up against the walls.

Near the opposite end from where you entered, you spot the occupants of this fortress sitting around a wooden table. While the three feminine alpha-imps are much the same as the guards at the gate, their leader is a very pale-skinned succubus, who's dressed exclusively in black.

Her shoulder-length hair, as black as the clothing which she's wearing, has been shaved into a sidecut, and as she turns to look at you, you see that she's wearing a heavy layer of black eyeliner and eyeshadow. The moment your eyes meet, her black lips turn up into a snarl, and she violently slams her fist onto the surface in front of her, before shouting, [npc.speech(Who the fuck are you?! You never heard to stay away from [npc.namePos] place, huh?!)]

[npc.Name] furiously hurls her chair back as she leaps to her feet, allowing you to see that she's wearing a pair of distressed jeans and knee-high gothic boots. These items of clothing are just as black as her leather jacket, which is unzipped to reveal a tight wrapping of black cloth around her modestly-sized C-cup breasts. She looks to have a silver piercing in almost every place imaginable, and, if it wasn't for her demonic tail and tribal-tattooed horns, she'd look just like a stereotypical angry goth girl. Not even giving you time to answer her previous question, she strides forwards, clenching a pair of brass knuckle-dusters in her fists and exclaiming, [npc.speech(You're just begging for a beating, aren't you, bitch?!)]

The three alpha-imps rush to back their leader up, and you realise that you only have a moment in which to either diffuse the situation, or ready yourself for a fight...

Once again pushing on the keep's crude wooden doors, you discover that they're still not locked, and, with yet another loud creak, they swing open before you. The hall beyond appears much as it did the last time you were here, with the many wall-mounted arcane lanterns casting a soft golden glow over the rickety wooden floor and the numerous oddly-assorted tables and chairs that have been pushed up against the walls.

Near the opposite end from where you entered, you spot the familiar occupants of this fortress sitting around the usual wooden table. [npc.Name] is the first to notice your arrival, and, furiously slamming [npc.her] fist on the surface before [npc.herHim], shouts, [npc.speech(Fuck! What the fuck are you doing here again?!)]

Furiously hurling [npc.her] chair back as [npc.she] leaps to her feet, [npc.she] then strides forwards, clenching her brass knuckle-dusters in [npc.her] fists as [npc.she] exclaims, [npc.speech(I'm gonna beat you to a pulp, you fucking bitch!)]

Smirking down at you, the [npc.race] raises [npc.her] voice so that [npc.she] can be heard over the chorus of mocking laughter coming from [npc.her] imp guards, and commands, [npc.speech(What a loyal #IFpc.isFeminine()#THENbitch#ELSEdog#ENDIF you are. I wonder, do you do other tricks on command as well? Go on, slut, beg.)]

I wonder, do you do other tricks on command as well? Go on, slut, present yourself for my girls.)]

Coming to a halt right in front of you, [npc.she] reaches out to grab your wrist, and, before you can react, [npc.she] yanks you forwards, pressing you tightly against [npc.herHim] as [npc.she] growls, [npc.speech(So how are you going to apologise for barging in here uninvited, you dumb bitch?!)]

Seeing the attack coming, you take a short step back, causing the [npc.race]'s attack to sail harmlessly through the air. [pc.speech(You'll have to do better than that.)]

Your taunt is met by an enraged scream as [npc.name] launches [npc.herself] at you. As this happens, you turn to the side and reach out to grab the cuff of [npc.her] leather jacket. With a firm downwards tug, you mange to half-pull it off of [npc.herHim].

[npc.speech(Oh, you want me to be serious, do you?!)] [npc.name] snaps. [npc.speech(Stand back, girls, this one's all mine!)]
